root: ^Lately, all I've been doing is reading cookery books and trying to imitate dishes from there.
^I need to hone my skills, because I want to enter the cooking competition at the Taste Fair.
^This year, a restaurant critic will try the dishes. I can't fail!
^Okay, I need to go outside, clear my head.
^_QUEST_ StartQuest It's time to visit the Taste Fair.
